title: "Hairline Switch" with Janelle James
itunes:title: "Hairline Switch" with Janelle James
description:
Do Black men with bad haircuts get more opportunities in white America? Langston and his guest Janelle James (Black Monday on Showtime) cut through the bullsh*t to find out why so many rich Black men look like they're allergic to a barbershop.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
